== Character Map ==

With Character Map, you can select a large range of non-standard and international characters to put in your documents.

Menu: Accessories > Character Map

== Key Features ==

* Choose from many different international categories

* Includes support for the phonetic alphabet

== Screenshot ==

<nowiki>[[File:scrn-charmap.png]]</nowiki>

== Installation ==

* Part of the default Ubuntu installation

== Hints and Tips ==
* View >By Unicode Block can make it a lot easier to find mathematical symbols.
* Search find dialog is also quite useful if you want to copy a particular symbol as well and searches over the names.  
== Other applications you may wish to look at ==

* '''Character Palette''' applet
* '''ComposeKey''' direct entry by typing multiple keystrokes
